video_prompt: A fairytale couple slowly embraces under a changing sky, their clothes subtly shifting with the wind. He looks down at her as his eyes gently close. Her gaze drifts upwards, her hair swaying. The background sky transitions from soft clouds to clear expanse.
image_prompt: A fairytale prince and princess in blue and silver royal attire, sharing an intimate, romantic moment under a partly cloudy sky at dusk/dawn. The prince holds the princess, both with wind-tossed blonde hair, illuminated by soft natural light. Focus on rich detail of their embroidered clothing and serene expressions.
refined_video_prompt: The couple's embrace slowly deepens, their forms coming together. Wind subtly ripples their flowing garments. His head dips, eyes gently closing, as her gaze gracefully lifts and hair softly sways. The background sky dynamically shifts, soft clouds dispersing into a clear expanse.
